title: Heu Ernte 2020 LU Uwe Wulf Schwaden und Pressen (Fendt Claas Krone Mchale [Yuneec])Landwirtschaft

tasks.task: Drive a farm vehicle to transport equipment
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat of the vehicle
Start the engine of the farm vehicle
Adjust mirrors to see surroundings
Check rearview mirror before reversing
Operate the steering wheel to navigate roads
Shift gears using a manual transmission
Drive straight on a straight path
Make a right turn at a corner
Stop the vehicle at the target location

tasks.task: Attach a trailer to the farm vehicle
subtasks: Drive the farm vehicle beside the trailer
Lower the trailer hitch coupler
Position the trailer coupler beneath the vehicle's hitch pin
Connect the trailer tongue to the vehicle hitch
Secure the trailer to the vehicle with safety chains

tasks.task: Operate heavy machinery (presumably a planter)
subtasks: Enter the cab of the machinery
Position the machinery on a flatbed trailer
Use a winch to pull the machinery onto the trailer
Secure the machinery to the trailer using straps
Drive the trailer to the field with heavy machinery
Align the machinery with the first row to plant
Lower the planting mechanism into the soil
Start the engine of the heavy machinery
Operate the controls to plant seeds
Monitor the planting process for errors
Navigate around obstacles in the field
Stop the machinery at the end of the row
Use the controls to raise the planting mechanism
Drive the machinery to the next row to plant

tasks.task: Manage a team of horses for pulling a cultivator
subtasks: Gather and lead the team of horses
Attach the cultivator to the horse-drawn cart
Direct the horses to pull the cultivator through the field
Apply the reins to control the horses' speed and direction
Monitor the plows for proper depth and soil coverage
Manage the horses' rest stops and water
Clean the equipment after use

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer to crops using an aerial sprayer
subtasks: Climb onto the aerial sprayer platform
Secure the sprayer equipment to the aircraft
Conduct pre-flight checks to ensure safety
Operate the controls to release fertilizer solution
Monitor the spray pattern for even coverage
Adjust the spray settings as needed during application
Land the aircraft safely at the end of the operation
Disassemble the sprayer and clean the aircraft

tasks.task: Handle tools and equipment used in farming
subtasks: Retrieve a sharp-toothed rake from storage
Use the rake to cultivate soil in a garden bed
Adjust the tool's angle for different tasks
Transfer loose soil to a wheelbarrow
Load the wheelbarrow with soil for moving between areas

tasks.task: Operate a grain combine harvester
subtasks: Board the combine harvester
Engage the hydraulic lift to raise the harvester's auger
Connect the combine to a header or swath
Start the combine engine
Position the combine in the center of the row
Set the cutting height guide vane
Monitor the combine's threshing efficiency
Control the speed of the harvester during operation
Manage the chaff and straw with the rotary cutter
Clear any blockages from the grain cylinder
Unhook the combines when done for the day
Store the combines properly in the barn

tasks.task: Engage in physical livestock husbandry
subtasks: Move a goat into a holding pen
Attach a halter to a sheep
Inspect a cow's udder for signs of illness
Milk a dairy cow using a milking machine
Clean the milking parlor with a scrub brush
Check for manure around the barn and add to compost pile
Harvest hay from a field using a baler
Bale hay and stack bales in a barn
